bill.title: Supporting Medicare Providers Act of 2022
bill.description: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend certain increases in payments for physicians services under the Medicare program through 2023.

history.action: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
